name: get_album
description: Get Spotify catalog information for a single album.

id.description: The Spotify ID of the album. Example: 4aawyAB9vmqN3uQ7FjRGTy

market.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. If a country code is specified, only content that is available in that market will be returned. If a valid user access token is specified in the request header, the country associated with the user account will take priority over this parameter. Example: ES

name: get_several_albums
description: Get Spotify catalog information for multiple albums identified by their Spotify IDs.

ids.description: An array of the Spotify IDs for the albums. Maximum: 20 IDs. Example: ['382ObEPsp2rxGrnsizN5TX', '1A2GTWGtFfWp7KSQTwWOyo', '2noRn2Aes5aoNVsU6iWThc']

market.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. If a country code is specified, only content that is available in that market will be returned. If a valid user access token is specified in the request header, the country associated with the user account will take priority over this parameter. Example: ES

name: get_album_tracks
description: Get Spotify catalog information about an album's tracks. Optional parameters can be used to limit the number of tracks returned.

id.description: The Spotify ID of the album. Example: 4aawyAB9vmqN3uQ7FjRGTy

market.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. If a country code is specified, only content that is available in that market will be returned. If a valid user access token is specified in the request header, the country associated with the user account will take priority over this parameter. Example: ES

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default: 20. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 50.

offset.description: The index of the first item to return. Default: 0 (the first item). Use with limit to get the next set of items.

name: get_users_saved_albums
description: Get a list of the albums saved in the current Spotify user's 'Your Music' library.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default: 20. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 50.

offset.description: The index of the first item to return. Default: 0 (the first item). Use with limit to get the next set of items.

market.description: An ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code. If a country code is specified, only content that is available in that market will be returned. If a valid user access token is specified in the request header, the country associated with the user account will take priority over this parameter. Example: ES

name: save_albums_for_current_user
description: Save one or more albums to the current user's 'Your Music' library.

ids.description: An array of the Spotify IDs for the albums. Maximum: 20 IDs. Example: ['382ObEPsp2rxGrnsizN5TX', '1A2GTWGtFfWp7KSQTwWOyo', '2noRn2Aes5aoNVsU6iWThc']

name: remove_users_saved_albums
description: Remove one or more albums from the current user's 'Your Music' library.

ids.description: An array of the Spotify IDs for the albums. Maximum: 20 IDs. Example: ['382ObEPsp2rxGrnsizN5TX', '1A2GTWGtFfWp7KSQTwWOyo', '2noRn2Aes5aoNVsU6iWThc']

name: check_users_saved_albums
description: Check if one or more albums is already saved in the current Spotify user's 'Your Music' library.

ids.description: An array of the Spotify IDs for the albums. Maximum: 20 IDs. Example: ['382ObEPsp2rxGrnsizN5TX', '1A2GTWGtFfWp7KSQTwWOyo', '2noRn2Aes5aoNVsU6iWThc']

name: get_new_releases
description: Get a list of new album releases featured in Spotify (shown, for example, on a Spotify player's “Browse” tab).

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default: 20. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 50.

offset.description: The index of the first item to return. Default: 0 (the first item). Use with limit to get the next set of items.
